Ich weiß gar nicht was ihr habt? Das Spiel ist ja eigentlich kostenlos, nur der neue PVE-Modus kostet 15€ eine zeitlich begrenzte Zusatz Mission ist sogar beim kostenlosen dabei und in 2 Wochen schritten kommen noch 3 dazu, die aber nichts mit den gekauften Missionen zu tun haben 

Fortnite und Destiny haben doch auch einen Kaufbaren PVE-Modus und bei Destiny muss man das sogar jede Session bezahlen. 

Also ich habe mir Invasion den PVE-Modus gekauft und man bekommt 3 stunden Story Modus mit 3 Missionen, mit sehr vielen schönen Zwischensequenzen und 1000 Overwatch Münzen die 10€ endsprechen, damit kann man zum bespiel für 950 münzen ein Battle Pass kaufen, also bezahlt man nur 5€ für ein PVE-Modus  

Der PVE-Modus hat wie üblich 4 Schwierigkeitsstufen, die man machen muss, um weitere Sachen freizuschalten wie z.b. andere Helden Skins, also locker nochmal das doppelte an spiel Spaß 

aber wer nur PVP machen möchte und die 4 Event PVE Missionen der muss NICHTS bezahlen

Fazit: Für mich persönlich ist die Story eine große Bereicherung in diesem spiel, auch wenn ich dafür 5€ bzw 15€ bezahlen muss, in SoT z.b. kostet ein Schiff Skin schon 25€

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

垃圾暴雪，司马考迪克，废物运营……这些我都懒得喷了，今天我就是要喷这个游戏本身。
16年预购的游戏，玩家怀念的都是那个5dva1dj强冲点的夏天。很快，爹开始教你玩游戏，乐趣大减。小锤出了后游戏平衡彻底被打破，爹再教你玩游戏。守望1就在龟速更新中结束了，想玩都玩不到了。
为了赚点钱，换个ui，减少个英雄，美名曰“2”，连半成品都称不上的游戏。
6v6时都不愿意玩T，说坐牢，现在T牢底坐穿。一个数值怪物站在你面前，不打死他，这波团很几乎赢不了。一个血厚的m站在队友前面挨揍，吃不到资源不如直接跳崖，队友还埋怨你没保他。双方都有“良好”的游戏体验。还有人说，以前的守望没人排T，不愿回去，看看现在，排队仍然缺T。这种受虐职业谁爱玩谁玩。
少了个T后，平衡跟不上。女王这样的一代库存英雄，根本不适合这个游戏了。以前T的基本思路是一个撑盾抗伤害，一个近身敌人，依托略高的数值吃掉对方。现在呢，更多的是吸引巨量火力，要队友的配合击杀掉对方人员。没有站在队友前抗大量伤害的能力，让对方的T死在你前面，这场游戏就可以放弃了。球，铁拳，猪，女王都面临这样的问题，没有正面。球，铁拳选出来恶心对面后排，己方后排被恶心，会玩的自己体验还不错，但被双方玩家骂了个遍。猪，这个活靶子存在的意义就是告诉双方，“我要摆烂了”。
大家讨厌蚊子吗，有被蚊子逼疯过吗？这里说的就是黑影，癞蛤蟆爬脚面，膈应人的东西。内心多么猥琐，阴暗的人才能设计出这样的角色。
今天新版本上线后，体验了下“新”出的PvE，这是什么？还有脸当噱头拿出来，和以前的合作模式有什么区别吗？还以为能做出魔兽，暗黑的大米一样让人刷刷刷，可以升级装备，更换天赋，统统没有。玩一次都嫌多的东西，做出来就是让玩家喷的？还有脸要钱？

暴雪早已不再是记忆中的样子，回忆中只有我们美好的青春。

F2P is weird for me to review. If you're just looking for something to boot up with some buddies every once and a while, Overwatch 2 will accomplish that, and you'll most likely have fun. If you're looking for a game that respects your time, and is worth investing in, Overwatch 2 really isn't it. 

Overwatch has an awkward history of being started with the intent to evolve into an MMO, but after the success of it's PvP-only launch, it was course corrected into a PvP focused, live service game. The result is a very teamwork reliant, meta driven game that requires you to stay up to date with it's ever growing cast. You get characters with abilities and kits that seem too strong for a competitive FPS. This leads to a lot of heroes being fun to play as, but not fun to play against. Even after balance tweaks, they generally end up being just a bit less fun to play, and not as annoying to play against. You can tell the devs want to make their characters cool and powerful, but are restricted by the fact that someone's always going to be on the receiving end.

There's absolutely some great things about this game, but the flaws really become apparent the longer you play. There's so much to keep track of, and so many factors out of your control. You really have to go into it with the mindset that sometimes there's nothing you can do, and you're just going to lose. If you don't like that lack of control or options, don't take this game seriously.

I've over 1000+ hours on Battlenet, having played since the 2016 Open Beta. I had a fair share of frustration over the years, but held on this long because I dared to see it for what it could be. For the foreseeable future, it's a fine game to casually play with some friends every now and then when a new season starts. It's not something worth regularly sinking hours into. It can be fun, but as someone that appreciates games that reward you for your time, I really can't recommend it.

I've played OW1 A LOT, but at the time it was a very good game with promise and soul.

It has degenerated into a soulless cashgrab, crawling at steam for relevancy.

Fuck this game, fuck blizzard, fuck anybody who encourages such practices by sending money their way (looking at you D4 players)

---

If you guys could send some Steam Points my way to compensate the 600 hours i've spent in OW1 i'd greatly appreciate it

If you were a big fan of Overwatch 1, then please avoid this game. I was a ginanimasaurus fan of Overwatch 1 ever since release day. I could even say that it was one of my favorite games of all time. It was DEFINITELY my favorite multiplayer game of all time, no question. I love TF2 and many other multiplayer shooters but Overwatch 1 lit a fire in me that wouldn't go away no matter how angry it made me. Maybe I would've felt this way about TF2 if I grew up with it, but for me that was Overwatch. I sunk hundreds and hundreds of hours into it on multiple platforms with joy. So when I heard that Overwatch 2 was a thing that was going to happen, naturally I was pretty stoked and I heavily anticipated what they would change with the game. But not even I could predict how much of Overwatch was flushed down the fucking drain. The shitty, rusty drain. Fuck you Blizzard. It is seriously a spit to my face and MANY OTHERS for REPLACING Overwatch 1 with this shit. That is the most unforgivable and fucked up part of this entire game. Fuck. You. Give me Overwatch 1 back.
游戏是会玩的，差评是不会漏的。

All the good developers left, so Activision Blizzard's management decided to milk the game to death: heroes locked behind the battle pass, overpriced skins; all the quality, character, and life was taken out of the game. Overwatch 2 is just a shop with a game attached to it. There was the promised "campaign" mode they've been working on for four years, yet they got nothing to show for it. What have they been working on? What was once a beautiful game is now just another soulless battle pass-ridden final stand to monetize the Overwatch IP before it just dies out in the gaming scene.

Man, this game hurts my soul. I remember how much I liked Overwatch, and with it's (somehow) good lootbox system that actually made sense for a $60 game, and it worked out to let you get a decent chance to get those cool skins you've wanted. 

Now, overwatch 2.... god overwatch 2. They had so much they could have done, but it just felt like overwatch 1, but slightly prettier and with enough microtrancations + 'battle pass' to kill any hope I would have had to actually continue playing. 

I really, really hoped that overwatch 2 would be a great shot in the arm when it was announced, and had faith in the re-playable missions that you had to pay for. But this?

我曾经很爱我的初恋，那种年少的悸动、单纯的爱恋很让人上头。后来热恋期过了，我发现她有很多异性朋友经常联系，这让我很不爽，但她还是我的所以并没有太在意。后来她开始不尊重我的意见，自作主张做了很多我不能接受的决定，我心想两个人在一起不会一帆风顺，都要磨合。后来我偶尔会闻到她身上有烟味，而我是从来不抽烟的，怀疑的心情终究驱使我装上了监控。于是果不其然，我发现她出轨了，而且对我毫无防备，甚至在我家抓现行时她也完全无所谓，继续在床上做着那种事。我把那个男人打了一顿扔了出去，她还是无所谓；我骂她、质问她，她还是一副“你爱怎样就怎样”的表情。我看着她的表情，吐了出来。这一刻我已经没有任何伤心、失望和怀念，只剩下令人反胃的厌恶。我离开房间，决定再也不见她。
多年以后，听说她傍了富哥，阔绰了。有一天她突然来找我，说想见我。我并不想见她，但我想借这个机会跟她把事情了解，于是我跟她约好时间地点。但是她并没有如约而至，而是迟到了半个小时，来的时候身上满是烟味，还说着是记错地方绕了很多路。我什么也没说，直接离开了，离开后那股反胃的感觉再次涌上喉咙。
不久后的一天，她又来找我，这次是求我养她。我不屑一顾，但是我不经意间发现，她求我养她的同时，还求着其他跟我一样的初恋？养着不止一个小白脸？这一次，我决定在她朋友圈发一个评论，让后来的男生都看清楚这个BYD的样子
